Package helpers

Class DownloadHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • helpers.DownloadHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Helper, java.lang.Runnable, ITimeoutEventHandler
    public class DownloadHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements Helper, java.lang.Runnable, ITimeoutEventHandler
    DownloadHelper to download a file. * @author huub.lievestro

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Create a new UploadHelper, and initialise instance variables.

      Check if source of Packet is the corresponding uploader.

      Process received Packet with byte[] from uploader.

      Transfer the byte[] of the File of the uploader, contained in Packets.

      Stops resending timed-out packets when number of resends is above threshold.
      void resume()
      Resumes this uploader.
      void run()
      Download file.

      Send acknowledgement packet to uploader, and pause packet if downloader wants to pause.
      void sendBytesToUploader​(int id, byte[] bytesToSend, boolean requireAck)
      Send byte[] to the corresponding uploadHelper, contained in a Packet, and, if required, resend this Packet if not acknowledged by any further received packets.

      Send packet to the corresponding downloadHelper.

      • DownloadHelper

        public DownloadHelper​(java.lang.Object parent,
                      java.net.DatagramSocket downloadSocket,
                      java.net.InetAddress uploaderAddress,
                      int uploaderPort,
                      int totalFileSize,
                      java.io.File fileToWrite,
                      int startID)
        Create a new UploadHelper, and initialise instance variables.
        Parameters:
        parent - creating this DownloadHelper
        downloadSocket - to use
        uploaderAddress - to download from
        uploaderPort - to download from
        totalFileSize - to download
        fileToWrite - to receive and write
        startID - where te uploader will start

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Download file.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • initiateTransfer

        public void initiateTransfer()
        Send initiation by downloader, (may be needed to let downloader open a way through Firewall(s) first).

      • receiveBytes

        public void receiveBytes()
        Transfer the byte[] of the File of the uploader, contained in Packets.

      • processPacket

        public void processPacket​(Packet receivedPacket)
        Process received Packet with byte[] from uploader. Security note: source should already be checked when receiving packet!
        Parameters:
        packet - to process

      • sendAck

        public void sendAck​(int nrToAck)
        Send acknowledgement packet to uploader, and pause packet if downloader wants to pause. Note: also checks for ID wraparound (= going beyond MAX_ID and starting at zero again)
        Parameters:
        nrToAck - to uploader

      • checkComplete

        public void checkComplete()
        Check if the download is complete, by comparing actual received bytes to totalFileSize. Note: sets instance variable complete to true, doesn't return a boolean.

      • writeFile

        public void writeFile()
        Write the received bytes to File (on more permanent storage). Note: if writing fails, user is asked if helper should try again.

      • sendBytesToUploader

        public void sendBytesToUploader​(int id,
                                byte[] bytesToSend,
                                boolean requireAck)
        Send byte[] to the corresponding uploadHelper, contained in a Packet, and, if required, resend this Packet if not acknowledged by any further received packets.
        Parameters:
        id - of the Packet to send.
        bytesToSend - to uploader

      • sendPacketToUploader

        public void sendPacketToUploader​(Packet packet)
        Send packet to the corresponding downloadHelper.
        Parameters:
        packet - to send to downloader.

      • timeoutElapsed

        public void timeoutElapsed​(java.lang.Object tag)
        If time-out elapsed and packet is not acknowledged: resend packet.
        Specified by:
        timeoutElapsed in interface ITimeoutEventHandler
        Parameters:
        tag - Object that called timeoutElapsed

      • restrictResend

        public void restrictResend​(Packet packet)
        Stops resending timed-out packets when number of resends is above threshold.
        Parameters:
        packet - that is being resend

      • checkSource

        public boolean checkSource​(Packet receivedPacket)
        Check if source of Packet is the corresponding uploader.
        Parameters:
        receivedPacket - to check
        Returns:
        true if source if the corresponding uploader, and false if not.

      • setStartID

        public void setStartID​(int startID)

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pause this downloader. Note: working indirectly, uploader is asked to pause transfer via a PAUSE packet
        Specified by:
        pause in interface Helper

      • resume

        public void resume()
        Resumes this uploader. Note: working indirectly, uploader is asked to resume transfer via a RESUME packet
        Specified by:
        resume in interface Helper

      • isPaused

        public boolean isPaused()
        Description copied from interface: Helper
        Check if Helper is paused.
        Specified by:
        isPaused in interface Helper
        Returns:
        true if Helper is paused
